## Readings

- <i class="fas fa-external-link-square-alt"></i> [Naomi Robbins, "Are Grid Lines Useful or Chartjunk?"](https://www.forbes.com/sites/naomirobbins/2012/02/22/are-grid-lines-useful-or-chartjunk/#3b49a4044283)
